post.author: 김태희
post.content:
Empirical

Intermediate Java Developer

We are seeking a Java Software Developer to join our team. While being involved in various parts of the business and new application development, your primary focus will be our core custom solution in-house. Common tasks include working with our team to define, refine and understand requirements, development of new features, unit testing features and ensuring timelines are met. Learning the system architecture, design of the current system and identifying areas that need to be refactored and documented will also be core tasks.

Generating new ideas, dealing with constant change and effectively communicating information will be key to success in this role as you will also be developing progressive, leading edge social media applications in Facebook and other online community platforms.

If this sounds interesting, and you'd like to join an exciting team working in the Toronto area, then we would love to hear from you.

Primary Responsibilities:
Aid in the development of a proprietary, custom email, contesting and surveying application
Develop and maintain application code
Trouble-shoot software problems and identify/implement solutions
Contribute to brainstorming sessions for new refactoring ideas
Develop unit tests to ensure acceptable levels of unit testing
Assist in deployment of web applications, and development of deployment plans
Creation and maintenance of database structures
Ensure code and development practices confirm to company standards
Prepare technical documentation
Personal Skill Requirements:
Excellent verbal and written communication skills along with an ability to be self-motivated in meeting tight deadlines
Strong problem solving skills
Ability to work independently and provide appropriate status and updates to management
Self-starter with ability to learn quickly
Team player with positive attitude
Technical Skill Requirements:
2+ years experience in systems development with 2+ years in Internet environment
2+ years development experience working with Java and J2EE
2+ years experience working with Apache
Experience working with in Linux and exposure to Adobe JRun
Solid web skills (JavaScript, HTML, AJAX, XML, SAX/DOM/XSLT, etc)
Experience with web services
2+ years of relational database experience (comfortable with MS SQL 2003+)
Experience using database technologies (JDBC, Hibernate, etc)
Experience using Eclipse
Experience developing application for Mobile
Other Valuable Skills:
Experience with developing vector marketing and/or contest solution
Development experience using JQuery, PHP and .NET
Experience developing applications for Social Media platforms (Facebook, Twitter and others)
Struts 1+ years experience
Database experience using MySQL and Oracle
Experience using Axis and other Apache Java libraries
Experience using build technologies (ANT, Maven, etc)


Date:        February 25, 2010
City/Town:        Toronto
Location:        ON/Toronto/GTA
Wage/Salary:        $70,000 - $75,000
Start:        Immediate
Duration:        Full-time permanent
Type:         Full Time
How to apply:        
Company:        Empirical
Contact:        Carreers at Empirical
Phone:        
Fax:        
Email:careers@empirical.com
post.title: Java Developer-EMPIRICAL
